Switch Case  Program 


Write a program to print the output depending upon the input.




Write a program to check the letter and print it is vowel or consonant:

First Method:




Second method:


Write a program to print the day corresponding to the number. If 1 is the number then day is Sunday:



Write a program to print the month corresponding to the number. if 1 is the number then month is January.

class switch_month
{
public static void main()
{
int num=5;
switch(num)
{
case (1):
System.out.println(num+ " is January");
break;
case (2):
System.out.println(num+ " is Feburary");
break;
case (3):
System.out.println(num+ " is March");
break;
case (4):
System.out.println(num+ " is April");
break;
case (5):
System.out.println(num+ " is May");
break;
case (6):
System.out.println(num+ " is June");
break;
case (7):
System.out.println(num+ " is July");
break;
case (8):
System.out.println(num+ " is August");
break;
case (9):
System.out.println(num+ " is September");
break;
case (10):
System.out.println(num+ " is October");
break;
case (11):
System.out.println(num+ " is November");
break;
case (12):
System.out.println(num+ " is December");
break;
default:
System.out.println("The number is out of the range 1 to 12");
}
}
}
